ARTICLE.TITLE: SAPS (South African Police Service)
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Media Statement

South African Police Service

Office of the Provincial Commissioner KwaZulu-Natal

DURBAN - The police officers from the Provincial Drug and Firearm Unit embarked in an operation yesterday morning at Hillary.

The operation was conducted on Folkstone Road at one of the flats. The team entered the flat where a search was conducted. Upon searching the flat, the team recovered 202 pieces of rock cocaine, plastic packet of crystal meth, seven wrappings of cocaine powder and glass bottles with traces of cocaine powder.

A cash of R1500-00 suspected to be the proceeds of drugs was also confiscated. A 35-year-old suspect was placed under arrest for dealing and possession of drugs. The estimated street value of the recovered drugs is R126 000-00. The arrested suspect is expected to appear in the Durban Magistrate’s Court on Monday, 17 August 2020.

The KwaZulu-Natal Provincial Commissioner, Lieutenant General Jula welcomed the arrest of the drug dealer.

Ends
